original_text: He also who had received the one talent came forward, saying, ‘Master, I knew you to be a hard man, reaping where you did not sow, and gathering where you scattered no seed,
korean_text: 한 달란트 받았던 자는 와서 이르되 주인이여 당신은 굳은 사람이라 심지 않은 데서 거두고 헤치지 않은 데서 모으는 줄을 내가 알았으므로

sentences.original_text: He also who had received the one talent came forward,
I knew you to be a hard man,
reaping where you did not sow,
and gathering where you scattered no seed,
